pyGXrender / gximagecomputing
  • CLI Workflow Modules

CLI Workflow Modules

These modules back the gxrender-mw and gxrender-euv command-line entry points and are also importable from Python if you need workflow-level control.

MW workflow

gximagecomputing.workflows.render_mw.save_preview(h5_path, out_png, title)[source]
Parameters:

  • h5_path (Path)

  • out_png (Path)

  • title (str)

Return type:

None

Parameters:

  • result (dict)

  • freqlist (list[float])

  • out_dir (Path)

  • stem (str)

  • xc (float)

  • yc (float)

  • dx (float)

  • dy (float)

  • obs_time_iso (str)

Return type:

list[str]
